title: Jesse's Brother
description: One woman, two men: a single summer to choose between them.Sacrificing a summer to fix her relationship with her mother and find out what’s troubling her father isn’t so bad...right? Wrong. Or so Samantha learns upon her return to Portland. As if family drama wasn’t bad enough, first comes Noah. Then comes Jesse. Samantha is torn between the way her heart skips a beat each time Noah looks at her, and the way Jesse’s touch make her yearn for more. Content Warning: This title contains sex, family drama and a tough choice.
author: Wendy Ely
